Ying has filtered the annotated genes to remove small transcripts with no BLAST support.  I have a gff.  I want to create a csv with the genes to keep.

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
filtered.gff <- read_delim("~/Library/CloudStorage/GoogleDrive-jnmaloof@ucdavis.edu/Shared drives/TanOak/John_Maker/Round_2_USE_THIS_ONE/TanOak2.gene.filtered.gff", col_names = FALSE)

head(filtered.gff)
```

```{r}
genelist <- filtered.gff %>%
  select(ID=X9) %>%
  mutate(ID= {
    str_remove(ID, "ID=") %>%
      str_remove(";Name=.*")
  })

genelist
```

```{r}
genelist %>% write_csv("input/filtered_genes_keep.csv")
```
